test-case.label: Should wrap invalid JSON arguments in raw key.

test-suite.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestEdgeCases
test-suite.label: Tests for edge cases in message conversion.

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestEdgeCases::test_tool_call_arguments_as_json_string
test-case.label: Should parse JSON string arguments in tool calls.

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestEdgeCases::test_tool_call_arguments_invalid_json_string
test-case.label: Should handle invalid JSON in tool call arguments gracefully.

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestEdgeCases::test_assistant_with_tool_calls_no_content
test-case.label: Should handle assistant message with tool calls but no text.

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestEdgeCases::test_unknown_role_message
test-case.label: Should handle unknown message roles gracefully.

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestEdgeCases::test_unknown_content_block_type
test-case.label: Should handle unknown content block types gracefully.

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestEdgeCases::test_string_content_in_list
test-case.label: Should handle plain strings in content list.

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestEdgeCases::test_tool_name_fallback
test-case.label: Should use fallback for tool name in tool result.

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestEdgeCases::test_tool_call_with_function_format
test-case.label: Should handle OpenAI function format for tool calls.

test-suite.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestFunctionRoleHandling
test-suite.label:
Tests for function role message handling.
Function role is defined in amplifier-core as a valid message role (legacy OpenAI format, deprecated in favor of 'tool').

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestFunctionRoleHandling::test_function_message_formatted_as_tool_result
test-case.label: Function messages should be handled like tool results (backward compat).

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestFunctionRoleHandling::test_function_message_no_name_fallback
test-case.label: Function messages without name should use fallback.

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestFunctionRoleHandling::test_mixed_tool_and_function_roles
test-case.label: Both tool and function roles should be handled consistently.

test-suite.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestAllSixRolesIntegration
test-suite.label:
Integration test for all 6 amplifier-core message roles.
Roles from amplifier-core: system, developer, user, assistant, function, tool

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestAllSixRolesIntegration::test_all_six_roles_in_conversation
test-case.label: All 6 message roles should be handled without errors.

test-suite.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestDeveloperRoleHandling
test-suite.label:
Tests for developer role message handling.
Developer role is defined in amplifier-core as a valid message role. Both Anthropic and OpenAI providers wrap developer messages in XML tags. See: amplifier-module-provider-anthropic line 689, openai line 1392

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestDeveloperRoleHandling::test_developer_message_xml_wrapped
test-case.label: Developer messages should be XML-wrapped as user messages.

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestDeveloperRoleHandling::test_developer_message_multiline_content
test-case.label: Developer messages should preserve multiline content in XML wrapper.

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestDeveloperRoleHandling::test_developer_message_empty_content_skipped
test-case.label: Empty developer messages should be skipped.

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestDeveloperRoleHandling::test_developer_messages_before_conversation
test-case.label: Multiple developer messages should all be included with XML wrapping.

test-case.name: tests/test_converters.py::TestDeveloperRoleHandling::test_developer_message_list_content
test-case.label: Developer messages with list content should be extracted and wrapped.
